rooms.description: Spacious living area with raw concrete finishes and exposed steel beams, designed in a Brutalist style. Vastu aligned to the North for positive energy flow.
Functional kitchen with minimalistic design, integrated storage. Open plan layout adjacent to living area. Uses industrial materials to match Brutalist aesthetics.
Private bedroom designed for tranquility and comfort. South-facing as per Vastu principles to ensure stability and restful sleep.
Well-lit bathroom with functional fixtures. Uses simple finishes consistent with Brutalist design.

openings.description: North-facing entrance aligning with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Pool door connecting to the swimming pool area; designed to balance the interior-exterior flow.
Large windows to allow natural light while maintaining Brutalist aesthetics.
